name: Self-TalkPepTalk
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, what's in the news?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Being a Registered Nurse for almost a decade even though people came in with physical conditions I realized how much of those physical conditions were a manifestation of what was going on from within. I’ve developed a very simple framework that can help you to reprogram that negative self-talk.

Because the last thing you want it to do is to manifest into some physical illness or to keep you safe from living your best life or building that dream business and If you’d like me to take you through this framework so you can end that self-talk too, connect with me on Instagram @SelfTalkRemedy - I’d love to help you with this.

(The information in this skill/briefing is provided for informational and educational purposes only)
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
